# automq_deploy_profile (Data Source)

![Preview](https://img.shields.io/badge/Lifecycle_Stage-Preview-blue?style=flat&logoColor=8A3BE2&labelColor=rgba)

Using the `automq_deploy_profile` data source, you can retrieve deployment profile information.

> **Note**: This provider version is only compatible with AutoMQ control plane versions 7.3.5 and later.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "automq" {
  automq_byoc_endpoint      = ""
  automq_byoc_access_key_id = ""
  automq_byoc_secret_key    = ""
}

data "automq_deploy_profile" "test" {
  environment_id = "env-example"
  name           = "default"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) Target AutoMQ BYOC environment, this attribute is specified during the deployment and installation process.
- `name` (String) The name of the deployment profile.

### Read-Only

- `available` (Boolean) Whether the profile is available.
- `cloud_provider` (String) The cloud provider (e.g., aws).
- `dns_zone` (String) The DNS zone ID.
- `gmt_create` (String) Creation time of the profile.
- `gmt_modified` (String) Last modification time of the profile.
- `instance_platform` (String) The instance platform type.
- `instance_profile` (String) The instance profile ARN.
- `ops_bucket` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ops_bucket))
- `region` (String) The region where the profile is deployed.
- `system` (Boolean) Whether this is a system profile.
- `vpc` (String) The VPC ID.

<a id="nestedatt--ops_bucket"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ops_bucket`

Read-Only:

- `bucket_name` (String) The name of the operations bucket.
- `provider` (String) The cloud provider of the operations bucket.
- `region` (String) The region of the operations bucket.
